author: ajsutton
content: We've setup a Teku bootnode for Medalla.  PR has the ENR: https://github.com/goerli/medalla/pull/31

author: protolambda
content: About bootnodes, I wanted more options for testnets, and less build dependencies for a discv5-only bootnode, so I made this: https://github.com/protolambda/eth2-bootnode/ If it helps I can run or more of those for Medalla, for some diversity in bootnodes ðŸ™‚
